benchmark_details.name: AIPsychoBench
benchmark_details.overview: AIPsychoBench is a specialized benchmark tailored to assess the psychological properties of LLMs. It employs a lightweight role-playing prompt to enhance effective response rates and avoid psychometric biases.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the psychological properties of LLMs while addressing the differences between LLMs and humans in psychometric assessments.

data.source: Human psychometric scales collected from the Internet, books, and academic papers.

methodology.calculation: Bias is calculated comparing LLM responses to baseline human scores using provided formulas.
methodology.interpretation: Higher effective response rates indicate better performance of the benchmark.
methodology.baseline_results: Average effective response rate increased from 70.12% to 90.40%.
methodology.validation: The benchmark's effectiveness was validated through comparisons with various methods, including traditional approaches and established benchmarks.
